Conducted several courses in teaching Tajweed for children and adults.

Certified several teachers in one or more Qira'at.

questions.a: All our female teachers are specialists and highly experienced in teaching the Holy Quran, Tajweed and recitations.

questions.q: Can I try the service before subscribing?
questions.a: Yes, of course! We offer a completely free trial session lasting 20 minutes. Through it, you can meet the teacher, experience our teaching methodology, and determine your level, before deciding to subscribe.

questions.q: How is my level determined and the appropriate curriculum chosen for me?
questions.a: We conduct a short placement test when you register, and then the teacher evaluates your level during the first session to choose the curriculum best suited to your goals.

questions.q: What if I need to cancel or reschedule a session?
questions.a: You can easily cancel or reschedule your session from your control panel, at least 12 hours before the session time, without any fees.

questions.q: What are the available payment methods?
questions.a: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), payment via Apple Pay and Google Pay, in addition to bank transfer.

questions.q: Can I change the package after subscription?
questions.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your package at any time, and the difference will be calculated proportionally.
